inn1.comm: Steyn starts with a horror ball way outside off stump, would have been a wide in Tests
a lot better from Steyn, on a length and on middle and leg, blocked back to the bowler
a fantastic shot from Strauss to get off the mark, a well-timed push sends the ball rocketing past the bowler, all along the ground
a bit outside off, Strauss shoulder arms
on off this time, Strauss is a bit early on the shot as he punches it towards mid-off, slightly uppish
angling across Strauss, who is content to leave that alone
fullish and on the pads, clipped towards square leg
Denly also gets going with a lovely stroke, pitching on middle and leg, slightly overpitched, flicked past midwicket for four
angling across Denly, who glides it towards third man for a single
Parnell gets the ball to shape away a touch after pitching outside off, Strauss shoulders arms
slightly shorter, pretty close to off, Strauss rocks back and crunches that behind backward point
on offstump this time, Strauss gets forward and defends towards the leg side
shortish ball on off, sat up to be hit, Strauss goes for the pull, mistimes it to square leg
Denly is beaten by that 85.6mph delivery, just outside off, Denly looks to defend, can't get bat on ball
slightly wider this time, Denly glides it to third man for a single
overpitched and well outside off, driven firmly towards extra cover
Another short ball for Struass, he hops onto the backfoot and dispatches this one past square leg
fuller from Steyn this time, angling across Strauss, who thought of defending the ball before tucking his bat inside the line to leave it to the keeper
closer to Strauss's body this time, Strauss taps it towards point
Denly defends towards Gibbs at backward point
Parnell gets the ball to jag into Denly after pitching on a length, Denly is struck on the thigh pad, the ball rolls behind backward point
short and wide, Strauss carves that towards backward point, straight at AB de Villiers
Parnell overcompensates with a full ball on the pads, Strauss picks up four by tucking it past midwicket, superbly timed
this time Strauss gets an inside edge to the right of the keeper
on middle and leg, Denly pushes it towards midwicket
Strauss is being gifted runs here, short and wide from Steyn, smacked past point for a boundary, England are motoring along
full and just outside off, blocked towards the off side
back of a length, tight around the offstump, Strauss shows the full face of the bat as he defends
similar delivery from Steyn, Strauss defends stoutly off the backfoot
slower ball from Steyn, running the fingers across the seam, blocked back to the bowler
back to normal pace from Steyn, just outside off, Strauss blocks it towards point, good comeback from Steyn after that loose first delivery this over
Parnell is on target with a length ball on off stump, Denly blocks it back down the pitch
slightly overpitched from Parnell this time, Denly takes one step out and lofted it between the bowler and mid-off, not as well timed  as he would have liked, gets to the boundary anyway
much shorter from Parnell, well outside off, Denly tries to flat bat it past the bowler, mistimes it and it rolls towards mid-off
good-looking drive from Denly towards cover, placement isn't great though, straight at the fielder
Denly pinned to the backfoot by Parnell's short delivery, defended towards point
full this time and outside off, Denly manages to get his bat under that one and slices it over point, Gibbs chases after it and just about keeps it from crossing the ropes with a desperate dive
length ball angling into the pads, Denly turns it toward midwicket
shortish ball close to off, Strauss cuts it towards backward point
length ball from Steyn, Strauss takes a step out of the crease, drops the ball at his feet, wonders whether to take a single but decides against it
length ball on middle and leg, blocked back down towards the bowler
and again Steyn has some fielding to do, this was a slower delivery, Strauss pushes it towards the bowler
back of a length, on middle and leg, Strauss again takes a step out of the crease, looks to play that to the leg side, is struck on the thigh pad, the ball lobs towards backward point
just back of a length, outside off, Denly gets forward and defends
Kallis keeps it tight around off again, Denly is content to block it to the off side
on middle and leg this time, Denly defends off the back foot to the leg side
Shot! first loose ball from Kallis, full and on the pads, Denly flicks that over square leg off the front foot, lands just a few yards within the rope
again sliding down leg, Denly turns this towards midwicket for a single
that was a tight single, Strauss decides to take on Gibbs after tucking the ball towards midwicket, Gibbs misses the stumps, Strauss would have made his ground anyway
poor delivery from Steyn, length ball and very wide outside off, Strauss slashes it over backward point for yet another boundary
this one cramps Strauss for room, shorter too, Strauss cuts it to backward point
slower ball from Steyn, length ball on middle, defended towards the bowler
jags into Strauss after pitching on middle and leg, Strauss is hit on the pads but outside leg, mild appeal from Steyn
length ball on middle and off, Strauss looks to turn it to the leg side, inside edges onto his pad
pitching short of a length, on middle and off, defended off the back foot toward extra cover
shortish ball from Kallis, just outside off, Denly is surprised by the lift off the track, bottom hand comes off the bat as he defends
way down the leg side, the crowd cheers after Boucher dives to his left to collect
much better this time, back of a length moving into Denly after pitching outside off, Denly defends off the back foot
similar length, just outside off, Denly goes for a flamboyant pull, misses and is struck  on the hip, the ball bobbles towards backward point
on the legstump this time, clipped towards deep square leg, Duminy is onto the ball quickly, he slips in his eagerness to return the ball immediately, the ball barely makes it to Gibbs at midwicket
back of length delivery, nips into Denly, driven off the backfoot to mid-on

Kallis gets the breakthrough, Denly is gone, not exactly a wicket-taking ball, back of a length on the pads, Denly swings it towards square leg, looked like a good shot when the ball left the bat, but Denly manages to pick out Duminy in the deep
Shah's not short of confidence from the evidence of that shot, it was slightly overpitched outside off, he cracks it towards cover, straight at the fielder though
angling across Shah, watchfully left alone
and again Shah shoulders arms to a delivery that is outside off
full and wide, Shah looks to hammer it through the off side, gets a thick edge towards cover
short ball angling across Shah, glides the ball off the backfoot towards point
back of a length delivery pitching just outside off, Shah drives off the front foot towards sweeper cover for a single
short of length ball, on off, defended to the bowler
whoah, what a shot that is, after some watchful defending, he picks up the ball from outside off and swings it behind square leg for a big six
this time Shah goes over the off side, not too well timed, lands short of sweeper cover
punched off the front foot towards extra cover
on a length, on middle and leg, Strauss pushes it towards mid-on
just back of a length, pitching on off, Shah gets forward and defends

fantastic reflexes from Boucher, stunning catch to dismiss Strauss, a wide delivery outside off, Strauss gets a thick edge, Boucher throws himself to his left to pluck that one, two quick wickets for South Africa
the ball brushes Collingwood's pads and runs away towards fine leg, the trows comes in from Steyn, hits the stumps directly, the South Africans are excited but Collingwood is well in
defended back to the bowler this time
gets behind the line of this one and defends solidly
angling across Collingwood, who is happy to leave that one
on a length, on the pads, Collingwood pushes it towards mid-on, 'No, no, no' he shouts as Shah wonder whether to take a single
Shah slashes this one towards deep backward point for a single
short ball, outside off, Collingwood jabs it towards point
driven firmly back to the bowler by Shah
lovely shot from Shah, lashed to long-on for a boundary, Collingwood had to jump as the ball speeds through his legs
well outside off, Shah leaves that for the keeper
full and outside off, Shah carves it to deep backward point
length ball, angling across Shah, who walks across the stumps and defends the ball
'Nooooo' Shah cries to Collingwood after shuffling across the stumps and dropping the ball at his feet
back of a length, quite wide outside off, poked towards backward point by Shah
another dot ball as Shah shuffles across for the fourth ball in a row, defends towards backward point
on the pads this time, Shah gets a leading edge towards mid-off as he looks to work it to midwicket
and that's a maiden, Shah opens the face to guide the ball towards backward point
flighted delivery, driven confidently wide of mid-off for a single
Shah gets well forwards and blocks the ball
clipped towards midwicket, there's plenty of confused calling before the batsmen decide to come back for the second
not much turn for van der Merwe so far, Shah gets on the backfoot and glides it towards backward point
Shah offers the forward press to smother the ball
Shah gets forward and blocks the ball towards the off side
punched towards mid-on off the front foot
nudged towards square, both batsmen scream' No'
Shah charges down the pitch, Botha manages to get a bit of turn and strikes Shah on the pads on legstump
guided towards backward point this time
comes out of the crease and eases the ball wide of long-on to get a couple
Collingwood skips away from the stumps and carves the ball towards cover
guides the ball towards sweeper cover for a single
punched down to long-off for a comfortable single
stands tall and eases it towards sweeper cover for another single
Shah opens the face and plays it to backward point, 'No, no, no' shouts Shah, Collingwood was charging for the single, he turns back and makes his ground in time
driven towards short cover
uses his feet and drives towards de Villiers at cover
full ball, on middle and off, jammed towards long-on for a single
a bit of air, plenty of width for Shah, who drives it to sweeper cover
fullish ball just outside off, batsman gets behind the line and defends
flighted delivery, overpitched outside off, Collingwood goes for a paddle sweep, misses and is hit on the pads outside off
cries of 'Catch it' as Collingwood gets a leading edge to the off side as he looks to work the ball to the leg side
pulled towards deep square leg for a single
turns it behind square leg for a single
Shah comes down the pitch and drives firmly to long-off
Collingwood punches to long-on this time
full, on middle and leg, Shah plays it inside out towards cover
way down the leg side
on leg stump, glanced to short fine leg
Collingwood uses his feet to get near the pitch of the ball, swings it to the deep square leg boundary
on the pads, nudged towards midwicket
Shah stretches forward and opens the face, gets an outside edge that takes the ball past the keeper for four
steered to short third man
a touch short, driven off the backfoot to long-on
back of a length, watchfully defended by Shah
pitching just outside off, Shah turns it to midwicket, straight at the fielder
Collingwood does  Hayden-esque walk down the track, but he wafts at the shortish ball outside off, and doesn't make contact
England 100 comes up as Collingwood cuts the ball towards sweeper cover
Morkel's slower offcutter goes awry, well outside off stump
length ball, Shah walks across the stumps and works it towards midwicket, again the calling is not too clear between the batsmen
short and wide, slower offcutter, Collingwood calls for two as soon as he steers the ball behind point
length ball outside off, Collingwood eases it to mid-off
another slower ball, short and wide, Collingwood gets a lot power behind the cut shot, but doesn't beat the man at backward point
Shah dinks the ball towards cover and sets off for a single
Collingwood comes down the track and chips that over midwicket, couple of bounces before it crosses the ropes
full and outside off, Collingwood looks to squeeze it behind point, misses the ball
defends the ball onto his foot
full and quick into the leg stump, defended towards midwicket
Collingwood takes a couple of paces down the pitch and drives it to long-on
Morkel's first ball of the over is eased to long-on for a single
Morkel provided plenty of short and wide deliveries but is getting away with it, this one is carved to backward point
just outside off, opens the face to steer it to third man
again short and plenty of room for the batsman, Collingwood slashes it to sweeper cover
beamer from Morkel, head high, Shah slips as he ducks under that
a low full toss this time, played towards sweeper cover
Morkel continues to feed wide deliveries, Collingwood punishes this one, cracked past extra cover
nudged behind square leg for a single
fullish and on the pads, Collingwood shows the full face as he punches the ball to long-on
Shah skips way beyond legstump and defends to the offside
played with soft hands towards point
a bit of turn for van der Merwe after pitching outside off, gets a thick outside edge which runs towards short third man
muscled towards sweeper cover for a single to end the over
pitching back of length outside off, punched to the covers
back of length, Collingwood goes for the pull, but gets an under edge onto his pads
shortish and just outside off, guided down to third man for a single
a cross-batted heave from Shah, edges it to fine leg for a single
short of length, flicked behind square for a single
Shah walks across his stumps, turns an offstump ball towards midwicket
Shah opens the face to guide the ball towards backward point
fullish ball outside off, driven firmly to short cover
punched to long-on for an easy single
back of a length, a little bit of turn into the batsman, steered behind point for a single

great fielding from van der Merwe at backward point, diving full-length to his right to stop the ball, Collingwodod though he had got past the fielder and set of for the single, Shah screamed 'Wait' and Collingwood turns back
defended back to the bowler
Shah comes down the pitch and blocks it back to the bowler
nudged behind square leg for a single
full and on the pads, whipped powerfully against the spin to midwicket for a boundary
shorter ball, on middle and leg, Collingwood tucks it off the backfoot behind square leg
defended towards cover by Shah
lofted over the bowler's head by Shah, not particularly well-timed, long-on can run around and cut it off
gets forward and turns it to midwicket
quicker ball down the leg side, Collingwood backs away and is struck on the pads
clipped towards short fine leg for a single
nudged towards deep square leg for a single
superb drive from Shah, just a bit of width, Shah gets a big stride in and forces it past short cover and wide of sweeper cover
a single to backward point brings up Shah's half-century
played with soft hands towards point for a single
arm ball gone wrong, down the leg side
short ball, Collingwood goes on the backfoot and swings it for a big six, hits a blonde spectator sitting in the grass bank, she doesn't seem to badly hurt though
defended back to the bowler
short ball, pulled in front of square for a single
dabbed to backward point for a single
skips down the track and whips it to midwicket
Collingwood looks to defend, inside edges onto his pad
50 for Collingwood, he back away and flat bats the ball to long-on for a single
Shah looks to swipe the ball from outside off, misses
defended cautiously to the leg side
great way to bring up the 100 stand, Shah gets on one knee and slog-sweeps powerfully to square leg, the ball just clears the rope
defended back to the bowler
rocks back and punches the ball towards long-on
gets forward and blocks the ball to the leg side
a massive six from Shah, what did he have for lunch? he waltzes down the track and hammers it over long-off, a long way beyond the boundary
nudged behind square leg for a single
Collingwood also gets the ball away to square leg for a single
short and wide, 'Hit me' says the ball, Collingwood obliges by carving it past sweeper cover
pushed towards mid-on
leg stump ball, tucked to square leg for a single
superb cricket there, Shah was backing away from the stump, Both follows him, Shah plays a cut paddle fine down leg, Duminy dives at short fine but can't stop it
opens the face and guides the ball to bckward point
full on middle and leg, Collingwood works it behind square leg for a single
pushed back to the bowler
driven to short cover, where the fielder makes a diving stop
Collingwood shuffles across and tucks the ball behind square
an offstump ball is whipped to square leg for another single
punched off the backfoot towards long-off for another single
again the spectators on the grass bank behind midwicket are kept on their toes, Shah swings that way beyond the boundary, England are stepping up the pace here
well outside off, run down to third man for a single
defended watchfully back to the bowler
Shah is going berserk here, the sweep is proving very handy for him, uses the pace and flicks it for another big six
slower ball outside off, defended towards the off side
mistimed toward mid-on for a single
a thick outside edge for Collingwood, 'catch' is the cry but the ball is just past a diving backward square leg, Duminy manages to stop the ball at the boundary
Steyn is greeted with another Shah six, pulled off the front foot over backward square leg
Shah is on fire here, clubs another short one through midwicket, some power behind that shot
another pull, doesn't beat short midwicket this time
wide outside off, glided down to third man
back of a length just outside off, Collingwood defends towards the off side
Collingwood gets forward and drives it wide of sweeper cover, enough time to take two
slower delivery, driven to mid-on
clipped off the thigh pad behind square
Collingwood swivels as he pulls that one to deep backward square leg
slower offcutter again from Morkel, turned behind square leg
Collingwood takes a couple of steps down the pitch, and tucks an offstump ball behind square leg
Morkel's overdosing on slower offcutters here, Shah defends off the front foot
Collingwood goes for an ambitious pull to a short of length ball, eying the short boundary to midwicket, misses the ball
length ball well outside off, Collingwood blocks it towards cover
short of length, closer to offstump, inside edge onto his pads
full delivery, on middle and leg, Collingwood punches it to mid-on
a near yorker just outside off, defended back to the bowler
nope, Collingwood gets on the front foot, and eases the ball to long-on for a single to keep the strike, and extends Shah's wait for a century
down the leg side, Collingwood skips away and pushes the ball to square leg,
oh, that's cruel for Shah, a fantastic innings comes to an end, he looked to dink a legstump ball towards square leg, inside-edges onto his pad, ball pops up and gives Boucher an easy catch
defends his first ball off the backfoot to the bowler
bottom edges the ball towards cover point
on the pads, helped to short fine leg but no run
driven firmly to covers, Morgan will have to wait a bit to get off the mark
Collingwood rocks back onto the back foot and carves the ball towards sweeper cover
great shot to get off the mark ,what do you call that, a reverse-slap fine of third man for four
a far more conventional drive to long-on this time
defended to the off side by Collingwood
punched to long-off for a single
dropped a reverse-sweep from Morgan flies low to Parnell at backward point, a tough chance but you would expect that to be held
full toss on the pads, whipped to the leg side
Morgan shows he can do the orthodox shots very well, sashays down the pitch and launches the ball over long-off for a six
jabbed wide of long-on , Collingwood call for two and they complete a tight second
tucked behind square leg by Morgan
great running from Morgan, Collingwood punched the ball wide of long-on, Morgan wanted two from the outset, he dives back to complete the second
Collingwood goes for the reverse-sweep, a thick inside edge take the ball towards silly point
full and outside off, driven to long-off
outside off, tried to slog over midwicket, edged towards cover, chance of a run-out but Parnell misses the stumps
length ball, Collingwood bends his knee and swipes that to the midwicket boundary
Collingwood clears the front leg for a big heave to the leg side, it's full from Parnell, Collingwood drives to mid-on
Parnell bowling from wide of the crease, a yorker just outside off, driven to long-off
Super shot from Morgan, length ball just outside off, Morgan stands tall and thumps it past cover for a boundary, superb placement helps him beat the sweeper cover as well
full toss just outside leg stump, Collingwood squeezes it out to midwicket
Morgan is in sublime form here, a low full toss outside off, not much footwork as he clubs that wide of long-off
good ball from Steyn, a yorker on middle, dug out past the bowler, mid-off does the fielding
slower ball from Steyn, Collingwood backs away and guides the ball to short cover, Gibbs has one stump to aim at as Collingwood struggles to complete the run, Gibbs misses
full toss, punched to mid-off for a single
Steyn keeps it full, Collingwood drives a bit wide of Gibbs to have time for an easier single
Parnell continues to pick up the wickets, a full and wide delivery, Collingwood looks to carve it through the off side, gets an inside edge, the ball slams into middle and leg stump

great job from Boucher to save three runs, it was a short ball from Parnell just outside off, Wright guides it fine, Boucher takes a couple of paces before diving full length to his right to stop that
on the pads, Morgan swipes it down to fine leg for a single
full and just outside off from Parnell, Wright wafts at it and is beaten
keeps it up to the batsman, Wright backs away and throws his bat at it, gets it away to third man
a yorker on the pads, Morgan jams it towards mid-off for a single, great over from Parnell
a low full toss from Steyn, Morgan manages to get under it, and forces it past long-on for four, superb stuff from Morgan
even better from Morgan, Steyn test hims with the short ball, Morgan answers with a pull over deep backward square leg
full toss this time, Morgan hacks it to long-on for a single
a yorker on offstump from Steyn, Wright can only block it back to the bowler
a high full toss this time, not high enough to be a no ball, but surprised Wright, who gets his bat in the way and turns it towards midwicket
another yorker from Steyn, on legstump, Morgan clips it to long-on for a single
breathtaking batting from Morgan, low full toss outside leg, Morgan backs away and times that one straight over the bowler's head for six
goes the reverse-sweep, gets an edge towards fine leg
Wright walks across the stumps, gets on his knee and swings that past deep backward square leg for four
edged to third man for a single
a bouncer from Morgan, slower one as well, 78mph, Morgan looks to guide it to third man but is beaten
Wright is run-out, tough luck, a low full toss from Parnell, punched back towards the bowler, who gets a boot on it and deflects it onto the stumps, catchng Wright out of the crease
turned to long-on for a single
full delivery on the pads, nudged to long-on to bring up Morgan's half-century
eased to long-on again, Bopara wanted the second, but Morgan wisely sends him back
Bopara is gone, length ball outside off, Bopara looks to heave that over midwicket, a top edge sends the ball swirling towards Albie Morkel who hangs on to it
full ball, Morgan is hit on the pads outside legstump, the ball dribbles towards square leg
full again, on middle and leg, Broad looks to sweep fine, doesn't beat short fine leg
Morgan backs away from the stumps, Parnell follows him with a low full toss, Morgan thumps it to long-off
Parnell gets rid of Broad with a ripper of a delivery, inswinging yorker homes in on the base of legstump, better batsmen than Broad would have had trouble keeping that out
this one ends as a half-volley, flicked off the pads past square leg for a boundary, not a bad start for Swann
low full toss outside off, carved through covers for a single
knee-high full toss on the pads, Morgan dispatches that coolly over square leg, two men back on the boundary on the leg side, Morgan's not concerned by that
another full toss, lashed down to long-on where Gibbs fields
Morgan continues his onslaught, it was a half-volley on middle, Morgan swings his bat cleanly to send it for a straight six
this one is a yorker, Morgan muscles it to long-off
Swann blocks it back to the bowler
comes down the pitch, but again he can only hit it as far as the bowler
skips to the leg side and slices it towards extra cover to get a single
dabs the first ball towards the off side to get off the strike
superb catch from Smith ends Morgan's brilliant innings, Steyn kept it full, Morgan backed away and powered it towards extra cover, Smith dives to his right to  take a low catch
outside off, driven off the backfoot towards backward point
high full toss, just below waist high, Swann shuffles across and clips it to fine leg where Kallis does a good job of cutting it off
full and just outside off, carved towards point for a single
a fullish ball outside off, the batsman looks to swing it to the leg side but doesn't connect

inn2.comm: full and well outside off, left alone by Smith
slightly shorter, and closer to offstump, Smith shoulders arms
back of a length, on offstump, defended towards cover
overpitched outside off, Smith gets South Africa off the mark by pushing the ball between point and cover, Collingwood races after the ball to pull it in just short of the ropes
length ball on offstump, blocked back to the bowler
in the blockhole, Gibbs leans across and digs it out to the leg side
Smith greets Onions with a  pull, stands tall and swings that short ball to the backward square leg boundary
better delivery, on a length just outside off, Smith shows the full face of the bat as he defends
again it's short from Onions, this time Smith pulls it around to Stuart Broad at fine leg
length ball outside off, Gibbs goes for the extra cover drive, but gets it back towards the bowler off the inside-half of his bat
Onions bangs it in, outside off, Gibbs swivels as he goes for the pull, doesn't connect
back of a length outside off, Gibbs gets forward and opens the face to steer the ball to third man
pitches well outside off, and a hint of movement further away, Anderson will have to re-bowl that
overpitched on the pads, easy for Gibbs, he flicks that through midwicket for four, that has the crowd roaring
short and wide, should have been put away, Gibbs carves that towards covers, Denly dives to his right to stop that
shortish ball just outside off, Gibbs again tries to pull, misses the ball once more
length ball just outside off, Gibbs pokes it towards backward point
good line from Anderson, slightly shorter than the previous one, Gibbs pushes it back to the bowler
similar delivery, Gibbs gets forward and defends towards Strauss at short cover-point
poor ball from Onions, with fine leg in the circle, he feeds Smith on the pads, tucked fine by Smith for four, nice timing on that one
again Onions hurls it on the pads, Smith misses this time, is struck on the pad outside leg and the ball rolls toward short fine leg
much better ball, on middle and off, Gibbs blocks it back to the bowler
enough of the blocking says Gibbs, he steps out and swipes a back-of-a-length ball way over midwicket
superb comeback by Onions, slightly movement away after pitching outside off, leaves Gibbs fishing for that one, doesn't connect
slightly slower from Onions, Gibbs is tricked by that one, was early into an attempted pull, misses the bal which goes through to stand-in keeper Morgan
length ball just outside off, pushed towards mid-off, batsmen sprint through for a single
short ball outside off, Gibbs cracks that to deep midwicket
Collingwood jumps and fields a dab from Smith at backward point
on middle and leg, blocked back to the bowler
glided by Smith to third man for a single
Gibbs turns that one to midwicket for another single
Gibbs stands tall and caresses a length ball outside off through cover, not much footwork from Gibbs, doesn't matter
slightly shorter, Gibbs goes for the same shot and is beaten
Onions pitches it up,Gibbs gets a stride in as crunches it past cover for another boundary
good ball, slightly shorter, on offstump, Gibbs defends back to the bowler
full ball just outside off, Gibbs drives it towards covers
back of a length, Gibbs initially looked to defend but decides to let that outside off ball go
lower delivery outside off, Smith can't get bat on that
overpitched just outside off, Smith lashes it towards Wright at mid-off, Wright has to deal with some awkward bounce as he fields, he's struck in the stomach as he stops that one
Anderson shortens his length as he sees Gibbs advancing down the pitch, no room for Gibbs either, so he has to defend
on the pads, tucked towards deep square leg (fine leg is in the circle)
great job by Onions on the boundary, haring around to his right from fine leg and diving to stop that on, Smith had pulled that not-so-short ball behind square leg
Gibbs holes out to mid-on, gets on the backfoot to pull that ball, bottom hand comes off the bat as he plays that, no power behind the shot and it lobs to mid-on
starts with a good delivery on a length, pitching just outside off, Smith shoulders arms
similar length, closer to off, Smith defends off the backfoot
this is a fuller delivery, just outside off, Smith is drawn towards it, he doesn't edge it though
on the pads, clipped to midwicket by Smith for a single
Kallis looks to defend an offstump delivery, gets an inside edge towards backward square leg, that ball came in with the angle
full and a bit wide outside off, Smith reaches across for it, gets an edge as he tries to drive, wide of the keeper and too fine for third man, no slips in place, luckily for him
full and just outside off, blocked back down the pitch
length ball, close to off, Kallis opens the face and steers it to backward point
overpitched on offstump, Smith crashes it towards Swann at short cover
Smith shuffles across, dabs a shortish ball towards backward point for a single to bring up the 50
length ball, Kallis opts to play it off the backfoot, gets a thick edge down to third man
length ball just outside off, Smith drives it towards point
Kallis defends an offstump ball off the backfoot
an attempted yorker, Kallis manages to keep it out
Kallis gets forward and defends stoutly
wonderful cover drive from Kallis, driven on the up, good length ball from Broad, just outside off
back of a length outside off, Kallis defends it off the backfoot
way down the leg side
length ball outside off, steered to backward point
wider still from Anderson, again Smith guides it to backward point
short of length outside off, Smith looks to defend, gets a thick outside edge towards third man
great yorker from Anderson, barely kept out by Kallis
Kallis dances down the track and launches it over the bowler's head, ball rolls to a stop after bouncing near long-on
ends the over with a single down to third man
length ball outside off, inside edged towards square leg for a single
shortish ball on legstump, Smith helps it down to fine leg, bottom hand comes off the handle as he plays that shot
full outside off, another good-looking cover drive from Kallis
Smith punches it straight to Owais Shah at mid-on and sets off immediately for a single, makes his ground before the throw reaches the stumps
Denly takes the catch to dismiss Kallis, who perishes to a similar shot as Denly himself, swung around to deep square leg, Kallis needed better placement, that's a big blow
de Villiers punches his first ball towards cover
driven off the front foot to mid-on, straight at the fielder
an everything-behind-it heave from Smith sends the ball racing to the midwicket boundary
on middle and off, defended off the backfoot towards mid-on
Smith drives it a touch uppishly past the bowler, nearly brushes the non-striker's stumps, mid-on does the fielding
poor delivery, Wright lucky to give away only two, short and very wide, de Villiers crashes it past covers, but can't beat sweeper cover
full ball just outside off, Smith dabs it to backward point
Smith goes for the pull, but inside-edges on to his pads, the balls dribbles towards Collingwood at backward point, would have been close if there was a direct hit
full on the pads, punched to mid-on, Smith wants a single, but de Villiers calls 'No'
compact forward defensive towards cover  by de Villiers
jags into de Villers' pads, nudged down to fine leg for a single
defends the last ball of the delivery towards covers
de Viliers defends an offstump ball back to the bowler
dropped by Collingwood, Wright has his hands on his head, de Villiers slashes that to backward point, should have been taken, straight at the fielder
gets forward and blocks this one back towards the bowler
back of a length, on middle and off, de Villiers turns it to short midiwicket
first run of the over as de Villiers glides that one to third man
muscled past mid-on for four by Smith, it was overpitched and on the pads, smith didn't miss out
back of a length, on offstump, de Villiers jumps and defends it back to the bowler
length ball just outside off, driven firmly to short cover
de Villiers is beaten as he looks to dab that one to third man

great shot from de Villiers, good stride in as he carves it through the covers, Bopara sprints across to his right and dives to try stop that at the boundary, gets a hand on it but can't stop the ball
short and close to off, de Villiers jumps and dabs that to the short third man region
a typical Smith pull sends a short ball on middle to fine leg
Smith defends a length ball back to the bowler
down the leg side, brushes Smith's pads on the way to fine leg
de Villiers plays it with soft hands towards backward point
a bit of width for de Villiers, who slashes it past sweeper cover for a boundary
angling into legstump, tucked toward short midwicket
room for de Villiers to cut, he attempts the shot, but bottom-edges it to the keeper
length ball on off, dabbed down to third man
keeps it on a length, on the pads this time, punched to long-on for a single
pitched up, on middle stump, jabbed towards short midwicket
Smith skips well away from legstump to make room, lashes the ball to sweeper cover
de Villiers jumps onto the backfoot and hoicks that back of length delivery towards wide long-on, a diving Broad does the fielding
eases the ball towards long-off  for a single
de Villiers flicks a full ball on the pads towards long-on
length ball heading for off, Smith shuffles across and nudges it to square leg
great stop from Collingwood at nackward point, diving full-length to his right after de Villiers slaps the ball there
Collingwood shows off his football skills, de Villiers drops the ball towards backward point, the ball stops dead and Collingwood kicks the ball onto the non-striker's stump, Smith is in though
Smith forces the ball to deep midwicket off the back foot, that brings up SA's 100
outside off this time, smith glides it towards backward point
Smith defends an offstump ball towards cover
Smith skips away from legstump, waiting for the ball nearly a yard outside leg stump, Collingwood follows him, Smith doesn't get the room, so he nudges the ball to midwicket
again Smith backs away , again Collingwood follows him, this time Smith drives to mid-on
lovely shot from de Villiers, a classical drive off the front foot sends the ball racing past extra cover
worked away to deep midwicket
driven off the front foot, gets a thick outside edge towards point
tucked from outside off towards square leg
full ball on middle, Smith pushes it to short midwicket
poor delivery, short and on legstump, Smith powers it to the backward square leg boundary
Smith brings up his fifty with a repeat shot, this time Broad gets round to the ball but can't stop it
shifts his line to the offstump, Smith shuffles across and taps it towards midwicket
length ball on off, de Villiers turns it towards midwicket
de Villiers tips the ball towards point for a quick single
Smith is furious as he misses a legstump delivery, edges it onto his pads, and the ball rolls towards short fine leg
an offcutter sliding down leg, de Villiers misses out, he turns it straight to short fine leg
length ball on middle and leg, clipped to midwicket
Swann does some good work in the field, haring across to his right from backward point to cut off a de Villiers shot
Smith looks for a deft dab to third man, misses the ball
de Villiers eases the ball towards long-on for a single
quicker delivery from Swann, well outside off, Smith looks to cut, bottom edges it, too low for the keeper, very,very tough chance for Morgan
driven along the ground to long-on

great effort from Wright at long-on, de Villiers hammers the ball and Wright dives to his right to get a hand on it near the rope, he's about to cross the rope so he pushes the ball towards Ravi Bopara, but he pushes it too firmly, Bopara uns after the ball but it crosses the ropes
defended off the backfoot towards the bowler
an offcutter, goes for the slog sweep, misses it completely
another offcutter on legstump, Smith walks across and flicks it behind square leg
Smith rocks back and cuts it towards sweeper cover for a single
overpitched on middle and leg, de Villiers drives towards mid-on
again Smith misses out on a legstump delivery, Smith swings his bat in disgust
just outside off, Smith powers it to long-off

ooh, that could have been curtains for Smith, he was way outside his crease as he looked to work it to midwicket, misses the ball, is hit on the pads, and the ball rolls a bit wide of the keeper, Smith doesn't know where the ball is and continues to move forward, realises belatedly and hurries back before Morgan can collect the ball
slammed towards deep midwicket
cut away off the backfoot for a single
walks across and tucks it behind square
this time it is Smith who shuffles across to clip the ball to square leg
punched wide of long-on for two
driven to long-on for a single this time
a legstump delivery is flicked off the backfoot towards deep square leg
Smith gets on one knee and mows the ball towards deep square leg
de Villiers picks out Denly at midwicket, a length delivery, de Villiers hoicks it off the back foot, not enough power to clear the short boundary, and the waiting Denly holds on to a simple catch
Smith moves across and taps a middle stump delivery between square leg and midwicket
Smith walks across to nudge the ball from outside off towards square leg
first delivery to Duminy, and turns a lot after pitching on off, goes past the outside edge
defended back to the bowler
Duminy gets forward and blocks the ball towards cover
on the pads, Duminy gets off the mark by flicking the ball behind square
length ball spearing into middle and leg, Smith works it away to deep midwicket
an offcutter, gets a leading edge to cover as Smith tries to work it to the leg side
lashed along the ground towards long-off
tucked toward midwicket by Smith for a single
Duminy plays that off the front foot towards covers, beings up SA's 150
forced down to long-off off the backfoot
stands tall and punches the ball down to long-on for another single
heading down the leg side, helped to short fine leg
length ball, pitching on middle and turning away, Smith nudges it to square leg
a bot of extra bounce, Duminy adjusts well, and slashes it behind point
punched down to long-off for a single
Collingwood throws himself to his right to get a hand on the ball as Smith powers it towards cover
Smith turns the ball behind square leg again for a single
on the pads, flicked towards square leg
more legstump offerings, clipped to deep square leg
Smith opens the face and steers the ball to backward point
punched down to long-off, Collingwood dives to try stop that but can't
turned to square leg for a single
Smith again uses his ploy of skipping well outside leg, Collingwood has the familiar response of following him, Smith pushes the ball towards extra cover
back of a length, just outside off, Smith looks to pull, but the ball sneaks under his bat
Smith looks to power the ball towards long-off, inside-edges onto his boot, the ball rolls just past legstump
mistimed towards backward point by Smith
length ball just outside off, inside edged onto his pads
on middle stump this time, back of a length, Duminy attempts to swing it to the leg side, is hit on the thigh pad and the ball rolls towards short fine leg
on middle and off, Smith turns it to his favourite square leg area, takes a single
oh my god, what a clanger from Owais Shah, Smith lobbed the ball to long-on, Shah was in position early, waist high chance , an absolute sitter goes down
nudged to midwicket this time
Smith plays it with soft hands towards backward point
Duminy lashes it straight at cover point
Duminy back away to make room and drives a length ball down to long-off
on the legstump, Smith inside edges onto his pads
pitched it up outside off, drive it firmly wide of mid-off but Wright dives full length to his right, nice rhyming there, to save a couple of runs, excellent commitment
much straighter, worked away behind square for a single
lands on a good length on middle and leg, presents the straight bat and plays it back to the bowler
slower through the air, dropped it slightly short as Smith charged forward, punched down to extra cover

appeal for lbw, Onions can't control himself, landed short of a good length on leg stump and struck him in line as he tried to play it into the leg side, o wonder he was excited, the umpire though, shook his head, mighty close, the bowler will consider himself unlucky
pitching short of a length outside leg, an appeal again, but this can't be given, Smith is rapped on the pads, gets a leg bye this time to keep the strike
Smith's stepping it up, short and wide, cuts it down into the ground and gets it to evade Graeme Swann at third man, raced along the outfield
erring in length here, banged in short on the off stump, pulled away over midwicket for two more, Wright knows he's committed a mistake
but he doesn't learn from it, hurls it short again, slashed down on the bounce to third man for a single
back of a length on the off, defended off the back foot in front of point and  a single is stolen
much fuller this time, on middle, driven through to deep midwicket for a single
good end to the over for Wright, tight line on middle and off, Duminy can only play it back to the bowler
full ball outside off, Smith crunches it past a diving mid-off, long-on tries to run around and cut it off but can't
eased towards mid-on for a single
on the pads, worked to deep square leg for two, completes the half-century of the partnership
full and outside off, Duminy inside edges it towards square leg, Duminy doesn't know where it's gone, his captain calls him for a single and they get it easily
full on the pads, clipped towards deep midwicket for a single that takes him to 99
on the leg side again, hits the pads outside leg, rolls away towards square leg
fabulous shot from Duminy, length ball on the pads, Duminy times it wide of long0-on for a boundary
tipped towards covers by Duminy, that's a dot ball
thrid umpire called to see whether Smith has made his ground, an outside edge from Duminy takes the ball towards short third man, a direct hit from the fielder but Smith was well in
Smith gets to his century with a cracking shot, backs away and carves that past point for four, the crowd rises to salute Smith
played with soft hands towards point for a quick single
offcutter from Collingwood again, defended towards backward point
Swann's first ball of a new ball is punched to mid-on
outside edged towards backward point, dot ball
driven in the air towards short cover, lands just short of the fielder
Duminy looks to cut that outside off ball, misses, three dot balls in a row
gets a leading edge as he looks to work it to leg side, pops up in the air but lands short of short cover, Duminy struggling here
quicker arm ball takes out Duminy, Duminy goes for the cut, bottom edges it from offstump to the base of legstump
on middle and leg, smith turns it behind square leg for a single
Boucher turns the ball to midwicket
on middle and leg again, played towards square leg, plenty of confused calling before they decide against the second
strays onto the pads, nudged behind square leg for a single
Denly does a great job of keeping that ball in, carves past Anderson at cover, a diving stop from Denly saves the team two runs
played with soft hands, turned behind square, Smith pushes for the second and gets it
Colingwood races across from short midwicket to cut off a drive from Boucher
pushed towards extra cover for a single
quicker delivery, Smith pushes it to short cover
glides this ball from outside off past a diving backward point for four, hardly hit that with any power
Smith goes for the sweep, Smith is hit on the pads outside off,  the ball dribbles towards cover point
pushed off the front foot to the left of the bowler, Swann moves quickly across to cut it off
Smith shovels that short of length ball towards deep midwicket
short ball outside off, Boucher goes for the pull, misses the ball
and again, wider outside off, Boucher misses again, crowd starts screaming for a wide
Boucher steers that wide full toss past a diving third man, that was a gift from Broad
length ball on middle and leg, leading edge from Boucher takes the ball towards extra cover
full toss on the legstump, Smith says thank you and clips it behind square leg for four
he gets rid of Boucher first ball! a shortish ball from Anderson, Boucher goes for the pull, misses and the ball rips out offstump
Morkel's first ball is an inside egde back towards the bowler
bouncer from Anderson, too high, over Morkel's head, that's a wide
back of a length outside off, punched off the backfoot towards cover
free runs for South Africa, way down the leg side this time
slower ball from Anderson, length ball outside off, Morkel swipes at it but misses the ball
length ball outside off, Morkel pushes it towards extra cover
rapped on the pads on legstump, an appeal for lbw but that pitched outside leg,the ball dribbles towards point

Smith plays down the wrong line to an outside off ball, and is beaten, Morgan whips off the bails but Smith's back foot is in the crease, just about, third umpire says not out, and the crowd yells in relief
full on leg side, Smith clips it to deep midwicket
Morkel nudges it towards square leg for a single
Smith is struck on the pads, in front of off, but the ball was spinning away to miss the stumps , dot ball, great stuff from Swann
driven towards extra cover for a single
punched off the backfoot towards mid-on
first ball is slammed between the long-on and midwicket for four, that's Morkel's favourite region
Smash! Morkel gets under a length ball on offstump, smashes it straight over the bowler'shead, goes really high but has the legs to clear the ropes
a full ball outside off is dragged towards mid-off by Morkel
dot ball, priceless for England, Smith punches the ball back to the bowler
Smith is angry at missing out on a wide ball, it was well outside off, he can only poke it to point
shortish ball, just outside off, Morkel clubs it over short midwicket, not to well timed, and they get a couple
Smith skips away from the leg side, about three feet outside leg, Anderson follows him, Smith is struck on the pads, and the ball rolls towards short fine leg
dot ball, Morkel looksto swipe it to midwicket, mistimes it back towards the bowler
great ball from Anderson, a yorker on middle and off, Morkel can only dig it out towards the bowler
three dot balls from Anderson, in the Powerplay, this is outstanding from Anderson, a slower ball, short and outside off, Morkel decides against the ball
full and on the pads, helped down to fine leg
Anderson finishes a fabulous over, Smith was again backing away, Anderson keeps it outside leg, inside edged onto the pads, only a leg bye, Smith hobbles through for the run

length ball outside off, Smith looks to shovel it from outside off, it goes through to the keeper, stand-in keeper Morgan's great day continues as he throws down the stumps, South Africa attempted a suicidal run, Morkel is caught short, and that could be the end of the road for South Africa
Botha backs away and looks to cut powerfully, misses the ball
Botha is gone, and South Africa are heading for the exit door, back of length ball, Botha looks to smack it to the leg side, mishits it and it ends as a simple catch at mid-off
full and outside off, Smith carves it towards extra cover, 'No' cries Smith as it goes straight to the fielder
Smith lashes this length ball over the bowler's head, over mid-on as well that's a boundary
terrible ball to end a good over, full toss on the legs, helped along to the fine leg boundary
cracks that powerfully, but straight at extra cover, Anderson continues to do the job for England
bowled him! a full ball, van der Merwe goes for the booming drive, he misses , Anderson knocks back offstump, top bowling this
a a full toss above waist high well outside off, called a no-ball
fullish ball in the pads, clipped to deep backward square leg, Parnell wants two but Smith can't run too fast at this stage
length ball outside off, carved towards cover where a diving Strauss does the fielding
slower bouncer from Anderson, Parnell was through with his shot before the ball arrived, attempts a second shot at it, the ball sails over middle stump
a great bouncer on legstump, Parnell can't do much with that
fantastic shot from Smith, what an innings this is from Smith, a low full toss outside off, shovelled over extra cover, this is now Smith's highest ODI score
full and outside off, Smith lashes it towards mid-off, straight to the fielder
another full toss outside off, Smith again looks to clobber it past mid-on, mistimes it to the fielder
the crowd finds it voice again as Smith slices another full toss outside off over backward point for four

this could be the end for South Africa, Smith's heroic innings comes to an end, Smith backed away and looked to smash that to midwicket, top edges it to mid-on, the crowd gives Smith a standing ovation
length ball outside off, Parnell swings and misses, the ball sneaks between bat and pad, England fielders are sure there was an edge on it, the umpire didn't think so
fullish ball on offstump, drives toward mid-off
Anderson keeps it full, Steyn thrashes it past the bowler for two
Steyn's not given up yet, he swings a length ball over wide long-on,. one bounce and over the ropes
overpitched outside off, Steyn punches it down to long-off for a single
outside off, guided to third man for a single
fullish outside off, confidently driven past extra cover for a single
length ball outside off, Steyn wafts at it and misses
Steyn punches the ball over the bowler's head, crowd cheers this time
an everything-behind-it heave from Steyn connects only with air
Steyn's attempted shovel sends the ball towards extra cover
Parnell rocks back and swings the ball to long-on for a single
wide down the leg side
short and wide, Steyn looked to dab it to third man, misses the ball
full toss, driven towards long-on for a single
Steyn swings a length ball to the square leg boundary
a full ball on middle and leg, Steyn force it towards mid-on
full ball again, flicked to deep square leg for a single
back of a length outside off, Steyn looks to smash that over midwicket, mistimes it towards cover

South Africa are knocked out of yet another tournament that they entered as favourites, driven off the front foot to covers for a single, there are four inconsequential overthrows as well, England march into the semi-finals
